title: Chapter 1881 - I’M Declaring War!
body:
Chapter 1881 - I’M Declaring War!

Su Yi’s gaze was calm and tranquil, as still as the waters of an ancient well.

When the man in the feather coat attacked, he combined offense and defense with incomparable experience and ruthlessness. However, his bearing made it obvious that he was on guard. That was why he’d launched such a terrifying attack so quickly. In fact, Su Yi was surprised to see that the man in the feather coat was using Great Unity Stage power!

During his trip to the ruins of the Dragon Palace, an attack like that might well have caught Su Yi off guard, especially if it was sudden, but… alas, this level of power was now beneath Su Yi’s notice.

He raised the foot-long peach branch and thrust it like a sword.

Bang!!!

A hole opened in the barrier of light defending the man in the feather coat. It offered no more resistance than paper window paneling. 

Immediately afterward, the man’s defensive power exploded, and his heart-protecting mirror shattered!

The supple branch of peach wood wasn’t some special material. Normally, it would have snapped on impact. However, in Su Yi’s hands, it was like an unbreakable divine sword slashing through...
